page.title: 04LOCAL PLACE NAMES.
page.content: Auchendownie- achadh+dunan - field of the little fort. Blindwells- a well supposed to cure blindness. Balcormo- baile + cormac- Cormacs town Balmain- baile + meadhon -middle town Branxton- town where banks were kept Balhousie- Balwolsy. "w" stands for original "ch". Baldastard- Balstardert. baile + sturr + ard - town at the point of height. Lundin(Lundin Links)- Londie. Linn dun - fort of the pool. Largo- Largauch,Leargach -sunny and seaward.Knoklargauch also occurs as an old name for Largo Law. Pilmuir- pill + mara -river inlet of the sea. Strathairly- strath + ard + liath -strath of the grey height.
